Class ReconnectWaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.network.client.ReconnectWaker

  • class ReconnectWaker
extends java.lang.Object
    Object that tries to reconnect if the network fails
    Author:
    Francesco Franzini
